After following instructions to install binary files for drc simulator...

Running 'gzserver' (as instructed on starting an empty world):
cop@father:~$ gzserver
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 1.0.2
Copyright (C) 2011 Nate Koenig, John Hsu, Andrew Howard, and contributors.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Error [SystemPaths.cc:229] cannot load file [sdf/gazebo.sdf]in GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH
Error [Server.cc:174] Unable to initialize sdf
cop@father:~$ echo $GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH
/usr/share/gazebo-1.2:/usr/share/gazebo_models
cop@father:~$ ls /usr/share/gazebo-1.2
media  sdf  setup.sh  worlds
cop@father:~$ ls /usr/share/gazebo-1.2/sdf/1.
1.0/ 1.2/ 

Looks like the directory structure has changed since that code was created?
